subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Good day Mr. Diana

I sincerely apologize for my late response to your mail. It was due to my
official engagement.


Please see below the requirements for the opening of the domiciliary
account where your payment will first be lodged inn before final credit to
your nominated bank account,


1.A valid copy of any form of your  identification/Driver's License,
International passport
2.a One passport photograph.
3. Your Next of Kin  with $95 official fee for the opening of the account


Yours Truly,
Dr. Usman Shamsudeen
